Text.Language: }galilea~ n~te nieynoc: n/ethemci qen p~,aki: nem t~q/ibi m~v~mou: ounis] n~ouwini afsai nwou.
Galilee of the Gentiles, those who were sitting in darkness, and the shadow of death, had great light shine upon them.
جليلوا الامم الجالسون فى الظلمة وظلال الموت اشرق عليهم النور العظيم.
V] v/eymoten m~mof: qen n/e#y#u# n~taf: af[icarx qen ]paryenoc: eybe v/e~te vwn n~oujai.
God who rests, within His saints, was incarnate of the Virgin, for our salvation.
الله المستريح فى قديسيه تجسد من العذراء لاجل خلاصنا.
Amwini a~nau a~ris~v/ri: hwc yel/l qen ous~l/loui~: hijen paimuct/rion: e~tafouwnh nan e~bol.
Come behold and be amazed, joyfully sing on account, of this mystery, which was revealed unto us.
تعالوا انظروا وتعجبوا وسبحوا وهللوا بابتهاج لهذا السر الذي ظهر لنا.
Je piatcarx af[icarx: ouoh pilogoc afq~yai: piatar,/ aferh/tc: piatc/ou afswpi qa ou,~ronoc.
For the One without flesh was incarnate, and the Word took body, the One with no beginning began, and the eternal One became temporal.
لأن غير المتجسد تجسد والكلمة تجسمت وغير المبتدئ ابتدأ وغير الزمني صار زمنياً.
Piats~tahof aujemjwmf: piaynau e~rof cenau e~rof: Ps/ri m~V] etonq: afswpi n~s/ri n~rwmi qen oumeym/i.
The Incomprehensible has been touched, and the Unseen has been seen, and the Son of the Living God, truly became the Son of Man.
غير المدرك لمسوه وغير المرئي رأوه أبن الله الحي صار بشريا بالحقيقة.
AViwt joust e~bol qen t~ve: m~pefjem v/eto~ni m~mo: afouwrp m~pefmonogen/c: i~ af[icarx e~bol n~q/].
The Father looked from heaven, and found no one like you, He sent His only-begotten, who came and took flesh from you.
تطلع الآب من السماء فلم يجد مَن يُشبهكِ أرسل وحيده أتى وتجسد منكِ.
